summary: The federal government has spent billions on information technology projects that have failed or performed poorly. Some agencies have had massive cybersecurity failures. These IT efforts often suffered from ineffective management. We testified about 2 issues on our High Risk List : 1) IT acquisitions and operations management and 2) cybersecurity. Since 2010, agencies have implemented 64% of our 1,376 recommendations on IT acquisitions and...
title: Information Technology: Federal Agencies and OMB Need to Continue to Improve Management and Cybersecurity
